l-dock position

data-dock-left

I'm left.
I'm left center.

data-dock-right

I'm right.
I'm right center.

data-dock-top

I'm top.
I'm top center.

data-dock-bottom

I'm bottom.
I'm bottom center.

l-dock offset

data-dock-left=10

I'm left.

data-dock-right=10

I'm right.

data-dock-top=10

I'm top.

data-dock-bottom=10

I'm bottom.

l-dock fill 20

data-dock=left 20 fill

I'm left.

data-dock-right=20 fill

I'm right.

data-dock-top=20 fill

I'm top.

data-dock-bottom=20 fill

I'm bottom.

l-dock -20

data-dock-left=-20

I'm left.

data-dock-right=-20

data-dock-right=-20

I'm right.

data-dock-top=-20

I'm top.

data-dock-bottom=-20

I'm bottom.

l-dock fill

data-dock=fill

I'm left.
